title: [Cancer] Cannabinoids, like delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol and cannabidiol (CBD), have the ability to reduce cancer cell viability. Pure CBD was as potent or more potent at reducing cancer cell viability as the most potent oil tested, as tested on 6 cancer cell lines from 3 types of human cancer.

[Health] Researchers found that older people with ‘young’ sleep patterns tend to have stronger cognitive abilities and a lower incidence of some health problems than do older people whose sleep patterns more closely reflect their age
